summary: NAR 06/19/2003.  *MR  THE CONSUMER EXPERIENCED PROBLEMS WITH THE DISK BRAKES EVER SINCE PURCHASING THE VEHICLE. THE CALIPERS AND ROTORS HAD TO BE REPLACED FOUR TIMES AND NEED TO BE DONE AGAIN. THE CONSUMER REQUESTED THAT DAIMLER CHRYSLER OWN UP TO THE PROBLEM AND REPAIR OR CONTINUE TO REPLACE DEFECTIVE PARTS TO MAINTAIN A SAFE VEHICLE.  *CB  *JB
